verbs.description: Senate Republican leaders [V: are] facing mounting pressure from President Donald Trump and a vocal group of rank - and - file senators to pass a series of spending bills ahead of their summer break and avoid a year - end messy fight to keep the government open , like the ones that have plagued Congress in the past .

[ARG0: Senate Republican leaders] are [V: facing] [ARG1: mounting pressure from President Donald Trump and a vocal group of rank - and - file senators to pass a series of spending bills ahead of their summer break and avoid a year - end messy fight to keep the government open , like the ones that have plagued Congress in the past] .

Senate Republican leaders are facing [V: mounting] [ARG1: pressure] from President Donald Trump and a vocal group of rank - and - file senators to pass a series of spending bills ahead of their summer break and avoid a year - end messy fight to keep the government open , [ARG1: like the ones that have plagued Congress in the past] .

Senate Republican leaders are facing mounting pressure from [ARG0: President Donald Trump and a vocal group of rank - and - file senators] to [V: pass] [ARG1: a series of spending bills] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of their summer break] and avoid a year - end messy fight to keep the government open , like the ones that have plagued Congress in the past .
